# Stock Report Fullstack Project

## Project Type

Full-stack Vietnamese stock market reporting application

## Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: Next.js 14 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- **Backend**: Django 4.2 + Django REST Framework + PostgreSQL
- **Worker**: Python APScheduler for scheduled tasks
- **Infrastructure**: Docker, Vercel (frontend), Render.com (backend + worker)
